title: Design Principles for {climateR0}
text: {climateR0} package allows estimation relative R0 mean temperature data climate sensitive pathogen/vector pairs. package directly estimate relative R0 temperature data instead interpolates constant temperature - R0 relationships Mordecai et al 2019. relative R0 can used generate simple short-term case forecasts.

title: Design Principles for {climateR0}
text: input output temperature_r0() function numeric vectors. function takes numeric vector mean temperature °C outputs numeric vector relative R0 (scaled 0 1) equal length input vector.

text: {climateR0} R package estimate relative R0 temperature data climate sensitive diseases. {climateR0} developed Centre Mathematical Modelling Infectious Diseases London School Hygiene Tropical Medicine part Epiverse-TRACE.
